alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jones; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wilkinson, northeastern Bibb, northwestern Twiggs and southeastern Jones Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over mainly rural areas of west central Wilkinson, northeastern Bibb, northwestern Twiggs and southeastern Jones Counties, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Gordon, Payne, Payne City, Postell, James, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Fitzpatrick, Greenberry Crossroads, Cross Keys, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill and Franklinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
